text: but every spirit that does not confess 4:3 that Jesus … has come in the flesh 93.7% ¦ Jesus CT 2.5%that Jesus 4:3 Christ 72.7% {ANT TR 14.3%} ¦ --- CT 5.2%Christ has come in the flesh is not from God. This is the spirit of the antichrist, which you have heard is coming and is now in the world already.
